name: ML Campbell High Performance WB Production Lacquer Sealer
description: ML Campbell High Performance WB Production Lacquer Sealer is a technically advanced single component clear sealer designed for interior wood millwork surfaces. It is based on European acrylic copolymer resin technology that offers fast dry, low VOC, HAPS Free formula designed for air dry and forced dry production application. HP WB Production Lacquer Sealer is ideal for quick application and features an easy sanding formula that provides a flat sealed surface for HP WB Production Lacquer topcoats.
